title: Self-Regulated Learning and Teaching Presence Enhancement Program in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency development for in-service professionals to apply mathematical theories to work situations

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply self-regulated learning (SRL) strategies in a blended learning environment to enhance cognitive engagement by 30% or more.
Through instructor support (feedback, structured guidelines) and peer collaboration (CoRL), learners can improve emotional engagement metrics in weekly learning participation by 25% or more.

In real-time problem-solving processes using digital simulation/VR tools, learners can recognize instructor presence (supportive environment, task design appropriateness) and leverage it for learning motivation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
